feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas in a similar style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical choices and word usage.

feature3.explanation: Both texts share comparable sentence structures and lengths.

feature4.explanation: Both texts display a similar tone and mood.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, and text features, along with the absence of spelling errors, there is moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
